name: Craftpunk
description:
Created in 9 days for Godot Wild Jam #38: Solarpunk.

Objective

You have to scavenge for resources and try to craft the parts needed to repair the navigation beacons. Figure out the recipes to match each of the three required components. 

There's no technical "end" to the game as more was planned, so when you have all three beacons lit up that's the win condition.

Controls ButtonActionW/A/S/D
Arrow keysMoveEInteractMouse ClickSelect itemMouse DragDrag item Credits

juniper_dusk - Programming, character design/sprite art

atvi - Music

Assets used:
  • Kenney pixel UI pack
  • Crafting Materials by Beast Pixels (added three components)
  • Pixel Art Top Down Basic by Cainos (just the art)
  • Futile - Humble Fonts by somepx
  • Monogram Font by Datagoblin
